thread.title: Sue M
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Sue M

author: Sue M
title: Sue M
text: Used Prestige Flowers around a month ago;whilst I didn't want self gratification from the friend who I sent them to but equally dying to know what the flowers were like, I left it to her to comment freely without prompting ... I spoke to her yesterday and she was over the moon with the flowers, said they lasted for ages and had many compliments about them. So with that feedback I'm placing another order for a friend who has recently lost a loved one. Just need to drop huge hints to my other half and I might get to see the end result myself one day! Easy to use website, delivered when they said they would and kept updated on delivery. Would recommend.
